name: 洪子逸
objective: 本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
schedule:
W1 Course introduction
W2 Introduction to modeling
W3 Modeling with linear programming
W4 Solving linear programming models
W5 Integer linear programming models
W6 Linear programming transportation models
W7 Shortest route, minimal spanning tree, and maximal flow models
W8 Managing projects with CPM/PERT models
W9 Midterm proposal/exam
W10 Modeling multicriteria problems
W11 Nonlinear programming models
W12 probabilistic models
W13 Decision-making models
W14 Waiting line models
W15 Simulation
W16 Forecasting models
W17 Inventory models
W18 Final project/exam
scorePolicy:
Performance in class: 35%
Midterm proposal/exam: 30%
Final project/exam: 35%
